rewrite1: To begin formatting the initial paragraph, start by eliminating any existing highlight. Next, choose 'Malgun Gothic' as the desired font style. Adjust the right indent to half a character (0.5 ch). Proceed by adding a 'Wave Double' underline for emphasis. Change the font's color to a shade of blue. Lastly, set the paragraph's Outline Level to 'Level 2' to structure the document accordingly.
rewrite2: Begin with the initial paragraph: Clear any existing highlight from the text. Choose 'Malgun Gothic' for the font style. Adjust the right indent to half a character (0.5 ch). Enhance the text with a 'Wave Double' underline. Color the font in a shade of blue. Lastly, modify the paragraph's Outline Level to 'Level 2'.
rewrite3: Begin by clearing any highlighting from the initial paragraph. Next, change the font to Malgun Gothic. Adjust the right indent so that it is 0.5 characters. Underline the text with a Wave Double style and change the font color to blue. Lastly, set the paragraph's Outline Level to Level 2.
